Title: Representative Brody
Plot: Carrie and Saul identify Walker's contact in Washington but their target has diplomatic immunity; Brody is approached to run for a disgraced congressman's seat in the House of Representatives.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: David Marciano, Chris Chalk, Ramsey Faragallah, Chris Chalk, Trent Dawson, Remy Auberjonois, Gabe Begneaud
